description: The scholarship is for UCO Students pursing a Forensic Science Degree. Eligibility Requirements Student is registered as full time graduate Must be a Forensic Science major Minimum 3.25 GPA This scholarship is available to apply for during the Current UCO Student Application.

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
